snippet.title: Wizardia Trailer - Play-to-Earn fantasy metaverse game, with NFTs at its core.
snippet.description:
👉  Get 5% OFF Wizard NFTs: https://wizardia.co/yt-trailer-wz
👉  Get 5% OFF Arena Genesis NFTs: https://wizardia.co/yt-trailer-ag

The brand new Wizardia trailer has emerged from the Fog.

👉 IEO, token claim & vesting overview: https://wizardia.co/ieo-yt
👉 Staking page: https://wizardia.co/yt-staking 
👉 Tokenomics: https://wizardia.co/toke-yt 

Head to Wizardia's latest giveaway and win great prizes 👉 https://wizardia.co/win-great-prizes

- - -

Wizardia is an AAA-quality Play-to-Earn (P2E) online turn-based battler with RPG elements, with a crypto-economy and NFTs at its core.

The game is built on three gameplay pillars:
⚔️ innovative turn-based combat,
⚔️ player-decision driven game evolution,
⚔️ upgrade-based character progression.

🏰 Arena Genesis NFTs allow early investors to receive pre-launch NFT staking rewards as well as post-launch passive royalty share from the game’s Battle Arena.

💸 The Wizardia token ($WZRD) is a utility token that also acts as an in-game currency. Tokens can be spent as well as earned or exchanged by every player inside and outside of the game.

Stay tuned for more gameplay announcements, artwork previews and economy details:

🔗 Web: https://wizardia.co/trailer-teaser
🔗 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playwizardia
🔗 Telegram: https://t.me/wizardia
🔗 Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/wizardia/
🔗 Medium: https://medium.com/@playwizardia

#playtoearn #p2e #cryptogaming #gamefi #crypto #solana #wizardia
